long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iKeyVault is a Chrome browser extension (plugin) that lets users save and access login credentials (Usernames & Passwords) for their online accounts in one place and access it from anywhere, on any device, and at any time. Users can also share access to any of their stored accounts for a limited period or any length of time with friends and family members. Access to the Users' iKeyVault account is protected by a patented technology application with a user-defined, unpredictable and constantly-changing custom code.
